skin.comment: For DJs of Argentine Tango and other social dances
skin.author: Sean Ericson

Pre-LISTEN\nPress to listen to track through headphones.\nPress again to reset track and volume.\nNote: you must set up headphones in audio options.
Toggle Deck 1 headphones. Headphones will come through deck when turned on.

-->
Add selected track(s) to the end of Automix.
FADE out song
AUTO PLAYBACK\nToggle auto playback (Automix).\n Next song will be loaded on other deck and automatically cued.
AUTO PLAYBACK FADE\nFade song on deck and play song on other deck.
Click to set Hot Cue. When active, clicking hot cue will start song at this point. Right click to disable Hot Cue.
Click to set Hot Cue. When active, clicking hot cue will start song at this point. Right click to disable Hot Cue.
Set loop between hot cues (only active when both hot cues are set). Click again or right click to disable.
Open Effects GUI
Configure recording options=""
Click to toggle between 'Single' and 'Dual Deck' automix mode.
set '$autoDblClickInd' 1
Recommended to set automixDoucleClick to 'nothing'. Click to change settings. Right click to toggle warning light.
Sound Card is not configured correctly
Setting Automix to 'Smart' or 'Remove Intro/Outro' will clip tracks. Click to change settings to 'Back-to-Back' (use song ending silence). Right click to change settings to 'Skip Silence'
Automix settings not configured properly. Can cause errors. Click to set 'autoMixTempoMode' to 'normal tempo' and 'automixSkipLength' to 0.
Automix 'fadeLength' setting is above 0, meaning the end of tracks could be cut. Click to set to -3 (a 3 second gap between songs). Right click to set to 0.
Crossfader is enabled which can cause TigerTango to not output sound. Click to disable Crossfader.
Fader Start is turned on. This will conflict with the fade and volume controls. Click to turn off Fader Start.
Auto match BPM, key, or pitch is turned on. This will affect sound quality. Click to turn these settings off.
Pre-LISTEN\nPress to listen to track through headphones.\nPress again to reset track and volume.\nNote: you must set up headphones in audio options.
Toggle Deck 2 headphones. Headphones will come through deck when turned on
Open Effects GUI
Add selected track(s) to the end of Automix.
Fade out song
AUTO PLAYBACK\nToggle auto playback (Automix).\n Next song will be loaded on other deck and automatically cued.
AUTO PLAYBACK FADE\nFade song on deck and play song on other deck.
Click to set Hot Cue. When active, clicking hot cue will start song at this point. Right click to disable Hot Cue.
Click to set Hot Cue. When active, clicking hot cue will start song at this point. Right click to disable Hot Cue.
